feed.title: twilio's PEAR Channel Server Latest Releases

entry.title: Services_Twilio 3.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: A SDK (or helper library, as we're calling them) for PHP developers to write applications against Twilio's REST API and generate TwiML responses.

entry.title: Services_Twilio 0.0.3 (beta)
entry.content: A SDK (or helper library, as we're calling them) for PHP developers to write applications against Twilio's REST API and generate TwiML responses.
